programme.title: The Farewell, (2019, Comedy)
programme.desc: Billi's family returns to China under the guise of a fake wedding to stealthily say goodbye to their beloved matriarch -- the only person that doesn't know she only has a few weeks to live.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The resourceful detective (Robert Downey Jr.) and his astute partner, Dr. Watson (Jude Law), meet a powerful criminal, a devotee of black magic who arises from his grave.

programme.title: The Accountant, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Treasury agent (J.K. Simmons) closes in on a brilliant freelance accountant (Ben Affleck) who works for dangerous criminal organizations.

programme.title: Villeneuve Pironi: Racing's Untold Tragedy, (2022, Documentary)
programme.desc: The story of Canadian Formula 1 legend Gilles Villeneuve and French star Didier Pironi, two fearless Ferrari Formula 1 drivers, forever torn apart by a historic and hugely controversial moment in time.

programme.title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn), (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Harley Quinn faces the wrath of narcissistic crime boss Black Mask and every other thug in Gotham. But things soon even out for Harley when she becomes unexpected allies with three deadly women -- Huntress, Black Canary and Renee Montoya.

programme.title: Mass Ave, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: A racial profiling incident forever changes the relationship between a man and his son.

programme.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: A fatherless teen starts to insinuate himself into the life of a renowned surgeon, his wife and two children. The full scope of his intent soon becomes menacingly clear when he confronts the doctor with a long-forgotten transgression.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: A lieutenant general (Alan Rickman) and a colonel (Helen Mirren) face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: An acclaimed neurologist (Jamie Dornan) taps into the unconscious mind of a 9-year-old boy (Aiden Longworth) who has survived nine near-death accidents.

programme.title: Cut Bank, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Things go from bad to worse when a murder witness (Liam Hemsworth) in small-town Montana tries to leverage the crime into a get-rich-quick scheme.

programme.title: House of 1000 Corpses, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: Four travelers take refuge in the home of a clan of demented killers. Written and directed by musician Rob Zombie.

programme.title: Balls Out, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fifth year college senior Caleb Fuller (Jake Lacy) gets his flag football team back together for one last shot at intramural football glory.

programme.title: Good Hair, (2009, Documentary)
programme.desc: Comic Chris Rock explores how hairstyles affect the self-esteem, activities and relationships of African-Americans.

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: London publicist Edina Monsoon and best friend Patsy Stone flee to the French Riviera after accidentally knocking supermodel Kate Moss into the River Thames.

programme.title: Teen Spirit, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: A shy teenager dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition.

programme.title: Confidence, (2003, Crime Story)
programme.desc: A con man (Edward Burns) and his crew swindle a gangster's accountant, then try to repay him by stealing from a crooked banker.

programme.title: The Lighthouse, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla, (1974, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An Okinawan monster-god helps Godzilla defeat his bionic double.

programme.title: The Ballad of Lefty Brown, (2017, Western)
programme.desc: A merciless cowboy sets out on a dangerous journey across the frontier, determined to do whatever it takes to avenge his longtime partner's brutal murder.

programme.title: 3 From Hell, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Crazed killers Baby Firefly, Captain Spaulding and Otis Driftwood unleash bloody mayhem after escaping from prison.

programme.title: A Cure for Wellness, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: After traveling to a remote location in the Swiss Alps, a Wall Street stockbroker (Dane DeHaan) unravels the terrifying secrets of a mysterious spa where guests never leave.

programme.title: House of 1000 Corpses, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: Four travelers take refuge in the home of a clan of demented killers. Written and directed by musician Rob Zombie.

programme.title: Batman and Superman: Battle of the Super Sons, (2022, Animated)
programme.desc: On his birthday, Jonathan Kent learns his dad is Superman and that he has superpowers of his own. He also meets Damian Wayne. The two boys are forced to team up to protect their loved ones from a hostile alien force.

programme.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: A fatherless teen starts to insinuate himself into the life of a renowned surgeon, his wife and two children. The full scope of his intent soon becomes menacingly clear when he confronts the doctor with a long-forgotten transgression.

programme.title: It Follows, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: Following a strange sexual encounter, a teenager (Maika Monroe) has disturbing visions and the inescapable feeling that someone -- or something -- is stalking her.

programme.title: Skin, (2019, Documentary)
programme.desc: Nollywood actress Beverly Naya explores Black beauty and the practice of skin bleaching in African culture.

programme.title: The Souvenir, (2019, Romance)
programme.desc: A shy but ambitious film student falls into an intense, emotionally fraught relationship with a charismatic but untrustworthy older man.

programme.title: Knight and Day, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: A woman (Cameron Diaz) gets ensnared in a deadly, global adventure when she becomes the reluctant partner of a fugitive spy (Tom Cruise).

programme.title: Everything, Everything, (2017, Romance)
programme.desc: Confined to her house due to an illness, a smart and imaginative 18-year-old (Amandla Stenberg) develops a budding romance with the teen (Nick Robinson) who lives next door.

programme.title: The Farewell, (2019, Comedy)
programme.desc: Billi's family returns to China under the guise of a fake wedding to stealthily say goodbye to their beloved matriarch -- the only person that doesn't know she only has a few weeks to live.

programme.title: Lady Bird, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: A teenager (Saoirse Ronan) navigates a loving but turbulent relationship with her strong-willed mother (Laurie Metcalf) over the course of an eventful and poignant senior year of high school.

programme.title: The Iron Claw, (2023, Biography)
programme.desc: The true story of the Von Erich brothers, who, through tragedy and triumph, under the shadow of their domineering father and coach, seek epic immortality on the biggest stage in sports.

programme.title: Love Lies Bleeding, (2024, Thriller)
programme.desc: A bodybuilder heading through town to Vegas is thrust into the dangerous plot of a violent crime family when she falls into a steamy romance with her trainer.

programme.title: Warcraft, (2016, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A king (Dominic Cooper), a mighty warrior (Travis Fimmel) and a powerful wizard (Ben Foster) unite to defend the human realm of Azeroth from a tyrannical shaman (Daniel Wu) and his invading army of orcs.

programme.title: Denial, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: Writer David Irving (Timothy Spall) wages a legal battle against historian Deborah Lipstadt (Rachel Weisz) after she accuses him of denying the Holocaust.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War, (2016, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A huntsman (Chris Hemsworth) and a fellow warrior (Jessica Chastain) battle an ice queen (Emily Blunt) and her evil, resurrected sister (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: It Comes at Night, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious apocalypse leaves the world with few survivors, two families are forced to share a home in an uneasy alliance to keep the outside evil at bay -- only to learn that the true horror may come from within.

programme.title: Anthropoid, (2016, History)
programme.desc: In December 1941, two Czech soldiers (Cillian Murphy, Jamie Dornan) parachute into their occupied homeland to assassinate Nazi officer Reinhard Heydrich (Detlef Bothe).

programme.title: Black Adam, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Bestowed with the almighty powers of the gods, Black Adam's unique form of justice, born out of rage, is challenged by modern-day heroes who form the Justice Society: Hawkman, Dr. Fate, Atom Smasher and Cyclone.

programme.title: The Exception, (2016, History)
programme.desc: During World War II, a soldier (Jai Courtney) travels to a secluded mansion to investigate a mysterious German monarch. He soon finds himself entangled in a web of deceit while having a dangerous love affair with a local Jewish woman (Lily James).

programme.title: A United Kingdom, (2016, History)
programme.desc: In the 1940s, Prince Seretse Khama of Botswana shocks the world when he marries a white woman from London.

programme.title: Tell, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: A small-time thief (Milo Ventimiglia) makes a big score and tries to keep it from his ex-partner, his ex-wife and other greedy sorts.

programme.title: The Disaster Artist, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: The incredible true story of aspiring filmmaker and Hollywood outsider Tommy Wiseau as he and his best friend defiantly pursue their dreams and embark on the hilarious odyssey of making the now-infamous, cult classic "The Room.".

programme.title: Blood Father, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: An ex-convict (Mel Gibson) and his estranged daughter (Erin Moriarty) go on the run from her drug-dealing boyfriend (Diego Luna) and his vicious cartel.

programme.title: A Bigger Splash, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: While vacationing on a Sicilian island with her boyfriend (Matthias Schoenaerts), a rock star (Tilda Swinton) receives an unexpected visit from an old flame (Ralph Fiennes) and his seductive daughter (Dakota Johnson).

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Former Police Sergeant Barnes becomes head of security for Senator Charlie Roan, a Presidential candidate targeted for death on Purge night due to her vow to eliminate the Purge.

programme.title: The Color Purple, (2023, Musical)
programme.desc: Torn apart from her sister and her children, Celie faces many hardships, including an abusive husband. With support from a singer and her stepdaughter, she ultimately finds extraordinary strength in the unbreakable bonds of a new kind of sisterhood.

programme.title: Blue Beetle, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: Jaime Reyes finds himself in possession of an ancient relic of alien biotechnology called the Scarab. When the Scarab chooses Jaime to be its symbiotic host, he's bestowed with a suit of armor that's capable of extraordinary and unpredictable powers.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: A girl turning 16 likes another girl's guy (Michael Schoeffling) and feels nobody cares about her birthday.

programme.title: Invictus, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Following the fall of apartheid, Nelson Mandela (Morgan Freeman) tries to unite his countrymen by supporting the South African rugby team's underdog bid for the 1995 World Cup Championship.

programme.title: Jonah Hex, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Jonah Hex has one foot in the natural world and one in the supernatural. His unusual nature gives him the ability to track down anyone, so the Army makes him an offer. It will erase the warrants on his head if he finds Quentin Turnbull.

programme.title: Vampires Suck, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: In a spoof of "Twilight" and other films, a pale vampire and a muscular werewolf try to win the heart of a beautiful teen.

programme.title: D...: The Musical, (2023, Musical)
programme.desc: Two self-obsessed businessmen discover they're long-lost identical twins and come together to plot the reunion of their divorced parents.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The resourceful detective (Robert Downey Jr.) and his astute partner, Dr. Watson (Jude Law), meet a powerful criminal, a devotee of black magic who arises from his grave.

programme.title: The Great Escape, (1963, War)
programme.desc: A group of Allied soldiers are intent on breaking out, not only to escape, but also to draw Nazi forces away from battle to search for fugitives. Among the prisoners are American Captain Virgil Hilts and British Squadron Leader Roger Bartlett.

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, History)
programme.desc: U.S. lawyers (Anthony Hopkins, Matthew McConaughey) defend Africans who revolted against their Spanish captors aboard a slave ship in 1839.

programme.title: K2, (1992, Adventure)
programme.desc: A playboy Seattle lawyer (Michael Biehn) and a family-man professor (Matt Craven) join an expedition climbing the Himalayan peak.

programme.title: The Mod Squad, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: A police captain saves three young adults (Claire Danes, Giovanni Ribisi, Omar Epps) from jail, recruiting them to work under cover in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Missing in Action, (1984, War)
programme.desc: A U.S. colonel (Chuck Norris) escapes from the Viet Cong, then comes back with a floating arsenal to get others out.

programme.title: Missing in Action 2: The Beginning, (1985, War)
programme.desc: An imprisoned U.S. colonel (Chuck Norris) fights the military overlord (Oh Soon-tek) of a slave-labor opium operation in Vietnam.

programme.title: Out of Time, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: Considered a suspect in a deadly arson, a police chief must cover his tracks while trying to prove his innocence.

programme.title: A Working Man, (2025, Action)
programme.desc: Levon Cade left behind a military career in the black ops to live a simple life. However, when human traffickers kidnap his boss's daughter, his search to bring her home uncovers a world of corruption far greater than he ever could have imagined.

programme.title: Novocaine, (2025, Action)
programme.desc: When the girl of his dreams gets kidnapped, a man turns his inability to feel pain into an unexpected advantage. He fights a bunch of thugs to get her back.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: Desperado brothers (George Clooney, Quentin Tarantino) kidnap a preacher (Harvey Keitel) and his kids, commandeer their RV and wind up in a Mexican strip joint where vampires lurk.

programme.title: Blink Twice, (2024, Thriller)
programme.desc: When tech billionaire Slater King meets Frida, he invites her to join him and his friends for a dream vacation on his private island. However, when strange things start to happen, she'll have to uncover the truth if she hopes to make it out alive.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke begins to plan his escape while Sigsby is distracted trying to expose Stackhouse's disloyalty; Tim loses a friend.

programme.title: Married to the Mob, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: An FBI agent (Matthew Modine) gets close to a gangster's widow (Michelle Pfeiffer) in order to nab a crime boss (Dean Stockwell).

programme.title: Danica
programme.desc: Racing superstar Danica Patrick reveals herself like never before: as a competitor preparing for her next race, a woman confidently considering when she wants to start a family and a budding mogul carefully considering thinking about her next steps.

programme.title: Boo! A Madea Halloween, (2016, Hallowe'en)
programme.desc: Cranky, fast-talking Madea (Tyler Perry) finds herself under attack from ghosts, ghouls and zombies after breaking up a fraternity's Halloween party.

programme.title: On Her Majesty's Secret Service, (1969, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (George Lazenby) proposes to a contessa (Diana Rigg) and foils SPECTRE chief Blofeld's (Telly Savalas) agricultural plot.

programme.title: The Living Daylights, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Secret agent James Bond (Timothy Dalton) takes a Czech cellist (Maryam d'Abo) to her boyfriend, a KGB defector (Jeroen Krabb) doing business in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Octopussy, (1983, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Roger Moore) links a fake Faberge egg to smugglers (Maud Adams, Louis Jourdan) in league with a mad Soviet general.

programme.title: Live and Let Die, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Roger Moore) charms a tarot reader (Jane Seymour) in Jamaica on the voodoo/heroin trail of Mr. Big (Yaphet Kotto).

programme.title: From Russia With Love, (1963, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Sean Connery) lands in Istanbul with a Russian beauty (Daniela Bianchi), a pawn in SPECTRE's plot to kill him.

programme.title: GoldenEye, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: A secret weapon's theft sends Agent 007 to Russia, where a pretty computer programmer helps him track an ex-cohort believed dead.

programme.title: Die Another Day, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: James Bond (Pierce Brosnan) teams with a beautiful agent (Halle Berry) to battle a terrorist and a businessman (Toby Stephens) bent on world domination.

programme.title: Dr. No, (1962, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Sean Connery) foils a SPECTRE madman (Joseph Wiseman) out to divert rockets from Cape Canaveral.

programme.title: The Fire Inside, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: The story of Claressa "T-Rex" Shields, a boxer from Flint, Mich., who trained to become the first woman in her country's history to win an Olympic gold medal in the sport.

programme.title: Sex Life
programme.desc: An erotic sleepover; the seduction of VR porn; rekindling one's sex life after a long illness.

programme.title: Jason's Lyric, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: A TV salesman falls for a spirited waitress and clashes with his wayward brother, as their lives reconnect in inner-city Houston.

programme.title: Three Thousand Years of Longing, (2022, Fantasy)
programme.desc: While attending a conference in Istanbul, Dr. Alithea Binnie happens to encounter a djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom. Eventually, she's beguiled and makes a wish that surprises them both.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke begins to plan his escape while Sigsby is distracted trying to expose Stackhouse's disloyalty; Tim loses a friend.

programme.title: Thelma & Louise, (1991, Adventure)
programme.desc: An Arkansas waitress (Susan Sarandon) and a housewife (Geena Davis) shoot a rapist and take off in a '66 Thunderbird.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (2016, Western)
programme.desc: Desperate townspeople hire seven mercenaries (Denzel Washington, Chris Pratt, Ethan Hawke) to battle a greedy industrialist (Peter Sarsgaard) and his ruthless henchmen in the Old West.

programme.title: True Grit, (2010, Western)
programme.desc: A teenage girl (Hailee Steinfeld) enlists the aid of a boozy, trigger-happy lawman (Jeff Bridges) to hunt down her father's killer (Josh Brolin).

programme.title: The Matrix, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

programme.title: Gladiator II, (2024, History)
programme.desc: Lucius must enter the Colosseum after the powerful emperors of Rome conquer his home. With rage in his heart and the future of the empire at stake, he looks to the past to find the strength and honor needed to return the glory of Rome to its people.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: As Luke's tests intensify, a new arrival causes problems for Sigsby; Tim isn't buying the official story about what happened to Annie.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: As Luke's tests intensify, a new arrival causes problems for Sigsby; Tim isn't buying the official story about what happened to Annie.

programme.title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts, (2023, Action)

programme.title: Renascido das Trevas, (2015, Science fiction)
programme.desc: J se passaram 5 anos desde o surto Re-Animated que eliminou 85% da populao mundial. Dentro de algumas cidades, os Re-Animated foram segregados em "zonas" e so vigiados pela QUASI S.W.A.T Unit R Division.

programme.title: Primeira Chegada, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Alex est flutuando inconsciente em um lago quando a luz de um OVNI a salva, aumentando suas habilidades, como telecinese e poder de cura. Seu amigo Sean a ajuda. As autoridades a querem - no apenas por roubar um carro da polcia.

programme.title: Desastre das Cobras: O Ataque na Ilha das Cobras, (2020, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Um grupo de funcionrios da revista Geographic chega a uma ilha deserta no Sudeste Asitico para preparar um novo espetculo. O lder da expedio esconde dos colegas que veio aqui para encontrar o pai, desaparecido h muitos anos.

programme.title: Megalodon, (2018, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Uma embarcao militar em busca de um submersvel no identificado encontra-se cara a cara com um tubaro gigante, forado a usar apenas o que tem a bordo para se defender da besta monstruosa.

programme.title: Conspirao Fatal, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de ser preso e ter sua reputao na Fora Area manchada, um piloto veterano foge da cadeia e parte em busca do verdadeiro criminoso. Ele, ento, descobre uma conspirao terrorista em andamento e somente ele poder evitar um desastre.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: No fim do sculo 19, Wong Fei-Hung enfrenta o saque estrangeiro na China. Com a violncia crescendo, at tia Yee questiona os ideais ocidentais diante do poder do Kung Fu.

programme.title: O Fantasma, (1996, Adventure)
programme.desc: A histria comea como uma expedio ilha de Bengalla, buscando as Caveiras de Touganda. Devido sua enorme energia, elas podem ser desastrosas para a raa humana. Agora, o mal encontrou rival altura e a aventura ganhou um nome: Fantasma!

programme.title: Outubro Negro, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jornalista americano viaja para Israel com o intuito de investigar a morte de oito fuzileiros navais, vtimas de um ataque terrorista. Mas ele acaba descobrindo que muito mais coisas se escondem por trs do incidente e sua vida passa a correr perigo.

programme.title: A Taberna dos Proscritos, (1954, Western)
programme.desc: Zona Libre um pequeno enclave do outro lado do rio da Amrica. Governado despoticamente pelo General Calleja, oferece refgio aos bandidos, a um preo.

programme.title: Famlia de Policiais II: Uma Quebra de Confiana, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: O inspetor Paul Fein volta sua antiga vizinhana para desvendar um crime: a mfia russa suspeita de ter assassinado um padre. Desta vez, ele precisa enfrentar fantasmas do passado, sob o risco de ter a sua famlia na mira dos bandidos.

programme.title: Uma Histria Americana, (1991, Drama)
programme.desc: Duas mulheres, uma negra e uma branca, em 1955 Montgomery Alabama, devem decidir o que faro em resposta ao famoso boicote aos nibus liderado por Martin Luther King.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da mfia japonesa suspeita de ser vtima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: Caadores de Emoo, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Johnny Utah, um jovem agente do FBI, se infiltra em crculos de surf para desmascarar uma gangue de ladres que, como marca registrada, usam mscaras de presidentes dos Estados Unidos durante seus golpes.

programme.title: Moiss, (1995, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Moiss foi um homem comum chamado por Deus para libertar seu povo, os Israelitas. Sua misso, libert-los da escravido no Egito e lev-los para Cana, a terra prometida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Hiruko Contra Duas Kunoichi!
programme.desc: Finalmente a luta entre av e neto comea. Sakura fica confusa com a aparncia estranha de sasori, e vov chiyo explica que aquele hiruko, o corpo que sasori usa para autodefesa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Verdadeiro Rosto De Sasori
programme.desc: Vovchiyo e sakura conseguem expor sasori, que incrivelmente no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos.chiyo fica ainda mais chocada com o segundo boneco que sasori revela.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades Secretas De Chiyo
programme.desc: Sakura pega pelas tticas de sasori e fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno. Mas ela usa uma papel bomba para se livrar da fumaavenenosa. Ela resolver se arriscar a capturar sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre o paradeiro de orochimaru.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pai E Me
programme.desc: A maior vantagem dos bonecos criados de humanos que ele pode assumir o comando do jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo.consequentemente, o boneco do terceiro kazekage tem ahabilidade especial de converter chakra em poder magntico.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terceiro Kazekage
programme.desc: Sakura revida oataque da areia de ferro do boneco do terceiro kazekage com uma fora sobre-humana. Ela aprendeu com tsunade que a habilidade mais importante de um mdico ninja se evadir um ataque.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Trs Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto secreto que ela tomou. Sakura explica a uma surpresa vov chiyo que esse antdoto converte o veneno em protena e funciona durante mais ou menos trs minutos.
programme.sub-title: Trs Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!

programme.sub-title: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Sonho Impossvel

programme.desc: A huge comet passes near the earth, vaporizing nearly the whole planet. But a few partially exposed people are now blood-thirsty zombies, and they begin a hunt for the remaining humans.

programme.desc: The legendary, beloved anvil-armed sailor of the seven seas comes magically to life in this delightful musical, starring Robin Williams as Popeye, who meets all challenges with the unshakable philosophy, "I yam what I yam and that's all that I yam."

programme.title: The Babadook, (2014, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: In this terrifying thriller, a mother must protect her son from an evil, supernatural entity that has escaped the pages of a children's book and is lurking in their home.

programme.title: The Woman in Black, (2012, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Author Kipps (Daniel Radcliffe), a widowed lawyer, is sent to a remote village to sort out the affairs of a recently deceased eccentric. But upon his arrival, it soon becomes clear that everyone in the own is keeping a deadly secret.

programme.title: The Woman in Black 2: Angel of Death, (2014, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: 40 years after the first haunting at Eel Marsh House, a group of children evacuated from WWII London arrives, awakening the house's darkest inhabitant.

programme.title: The Haunting In Connecticut, (2009, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, which turns out to be a former mortuary and sance parlor.

programme.title: Bones And All, (2022, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: In a world that cannot abide who they truly are, a young woman who is learning how to survive on the margins of society and an intense, disenfranchised drifter embark upon a road trip, searching for identity and chasing beauty in a perilous world.

programme.title: Alone, (2020, Zombies)
programme.desc: During a global pandemic, a man must battle swarming hordes of the undead to rescue a female neighbor. This zombie horror tale stars Tyler Posey, Summer Spiro, and Donald Sutherland.

programme.title: Wolf Creek, (2005, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Stranded backpackers in remote Australia fall prey to a murderous bushman who offers to fix their car, then takes them captive.

programme.title: Let Me In (2010), (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Owen, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Abby (Chlo Grace Moretz of KICK-ASS), a beautiful but peculiar girl who turns out to be a vampire.

programme.title: Hamburger Hill, (1987, War)
programme.desc: On the 11th May 1969, troops of the 101st airborne division engaged the enemy at the base of Hill 937 in the Ashau Valley. Ten days and eleven bloody assaults later, the troops who fought there called it Hamburger Hill.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 2, (1989, Action)

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 4, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Mel Gibson and Danny Glover reteam as a pair of Los Angeles police detectives. Promoted to desk jobs to keep them out of trouble, the two cops join forces with a junior detective and a fast-talking private investigator to unravel a series of crimes.

programme.title: Layer Cake, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Planning to retire and begin a new life, Mr. X (Daniel Craig, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider), a successful West End drug dealer, has been asked for one last favor: to negotiate the sale of one million hits of Ecstasy. Rated: R

programme.title: Revolver, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: Cop Land, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Director James Mangold (FORD vs FERRARI) extends his crime thriller classic that brings together a powerhouse cast, including Robert De Niro, Sylvester Stallone, Ray Liotta, and Harvey Keitel.

programme.title: Witness, (1985, Action)

programme.desc: From director George Clooney, Suburbicon is the perfect place for Gardner Lodge (Matt Damon) to raise a family. But the tranquil surface masks a disturbing reality, as Gardner must navigate the town's dark underbelly of betrayal, deceit, and violence.

programme.title: The Firm, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: Mitch joins a prosperous Memphis firm that affords Mitch and his wife an affluent lifestyle beyond their wildest dreams. But when FBI agents confront him with evidence of corruption and murder within the firm, Mitch sets out to find the truth.

programme.title: Kiss the Girls, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Eight kidnapped women. All beautiful. All talented. All in danger of having their lives cut cruelly short if police detective Alex Cross and key witness Kate McTiernan cant locate the elusive collector who calls himself Casanova.

programme.title: The Fan, (1996, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: When the San Francisco Giants pay centerfielder Bobby Rayburn (Wesley Snipes) $40 million to lead their team to the World Series, no one is happier or more supportive than #1 fan Gil Renard (Robert De Niro). Rating: R

programme.title: The Firm, (1993, Thriller)

programme.desc: While a maverick creator of America's favorite game shows gains notoriety for his smash TV hits, he is also drawn into a shadowy world of danger as a covert government operative. George Clooney directs this incredible stranger-than-fiction story.

programme.title: First Knight, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: Together, Sean Connery, Richard Gere, Julia Ormond (Legends of the Fall, Sabrina) and Jerry Zucker, the director of Ghost, bring you a new vision of King Arthur's Camelot.

programme.desc: In Nashville, there are 10,000 singer-songwriters chasing success... with one chance in a million of getting it. For Miranda "no relation to Elvis" Presley, that's one chance worth taking.

programme.title: Forces of Nature, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: All Ben (Ben Affleck) wants to do is make it from New York to Savannah, Ga., in time for his wedding. When his flight gets canceled, Ben reluctantly joins the quirky Sarah (Sandra Bullock) in a rental car for a road trip back.

programme.title: The Net, (1995, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Sandra Bullock, Dennis Miller and Jeremy Northam star in this hit thriller about a computer expert whose life is "erased" by a computer conspiracy. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Thelma & Louise, (1991, Action)

programme.title: Miami Blues, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: An ex-con (Alec Baldwin) tiptoes on the borderline of psychotic behavior, playing cops and robbers on both sides of the law. He robs and kills one minute and poses as a cop the next in this thriller with a comic edge.

programme.title: Hard Rain, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: The setting is the evacuated town of Huntingburg, where armored car driver Tom is in deep danger. A gang of thieves figures the flood is its chance to heist the $3 million Tom's transporting from local banks.

programme.title: Drop Zone, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Wesley Snipes free-falls into the daredevil world of sky-diving to track down a cadre of techno terrorists in Drop Zone, a chute-to-thrill adventure co-starring Gary Busey, Yancy Butler, Michael Jeter, and more.

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three, (1974, Thriller)

programme.title: Love And Bullets, (1979, Action)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Movie

programme.desc: The third duel of the Battle City finals between Mai and Marik is no ordinary duel; it's a battle in the dreaded Shadow Realm where losing Life Points equals losing your memories.

programme.desc: As Mai loses more memories under Marik's relentless assault, she loses confidence in her dueling abilities. Will Yugi and friends' never-ending support bring her back to victory, or will her shattered mind be trapped in the Shadow Realm for eternity?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 2: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai gains control of Marik's The Winged Dragon of Ra, but she's unable to decipher how to unleash its massively powerful abilities. Can Mai solve the mystery of the Egyptian God Card before Marik solves it himself?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 3: Mai vs. Marik

programme.desc: In the fourth duel of the Battle City finals, Kaiba's mystery opponent is Ishizu. With the power of her Millennium Necklace, Ishizu can see the future, including every card Kaiba is planning to play.
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 1: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Ishizu, using the magic of her Millennium Necklace, has already seen the outcome of the duel: she will defeat Kaiba with sacrifice's blast! How can Kaiba win when it's predestined that he will lose? Kaiba must change the future!
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 2: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Marik's evil grows, Ishizu reveals the secrets of her bloodline: How did Marik transform from a kind child into a power-hungry tyrant out for world domination? Can Yugi save Marik from the edge of darkness, or is he already beyond salvation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Bakura and good Marik summon The Winged Dragon of Ra, ready to blast and banish evil Marik into the Shadow Realm. But The Winged Dragon of Ra has more than one special ability, and evil Marik knows how to use them all.
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Shadows Part 2: Marik Vs. Bakura

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's blimp is hijacked by a mysterious boy named Noah and his henchmen - five familiar foes from Yugi and Kaiba's past who are out for revenge!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first to duel under the all-new Deck Master System is Yugi against Big 1 Gansley's Deepsea Warrior! Can Yugi master the complex new rules, or will the rules master him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Yugi struggles to make heads or tails of the Deck Master System, Big 1 uses his Deck Master ability to send all of Yugi's attacks right back! How can Yugi defeat an opponent when his attacks take away his own life points?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's running out of life points, but can his cute little Deck Master Kuriboh unleash his furry fury to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Prepare for a feathered fight when Ta squares off against Big 2 Crump's Nightmare Penguin where the loser will be trapped forever in a block of ice!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Ta's body turns more and more into a giant popsicle, can she keep her brain from freezing to find a way to melt Big 2's strategy? Or will Big 2's penguin horde waddle all over her?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the judicial jerk Big 3 Johnson who takes the Deck Master form of Judge Man! How can Joey defeat a foe who can destroy Joey's monsters at will?

programme.sub-title: Its Name is Enma! Oden's Great Swords!

programme.sub-title: A New Alliance?! Kaidos Army Gathers!

programme.sub-title: Ticking Down to the Great Battle! The Straw Hats Go into Combat Mode!

programme.title: The resolution that passed the Reverie and the incidents surrounding the conference stun people all over the world and corner the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Meanwhile, a Navy captain Koby secretly contacts someone who is currently in the Land of Wano.

programme.sub-title: A Legendary Battle! Garp and Roger!

programme.sub-title: The Number-One Samurai in the Land of Wano! Here comes Kozuki Oden!

programme.sub-title: Tearfully Swearing Allegiance! Oden and Kin'emon!

programme.sub-title: Changing Destiny! The Whitebeard Pirates Cast Ashore!

programme.title: Oden's journey finally begins. He is in awe of all the things that he has never seen before. And for the first time in his life, he becomes a wanted person and makes the headlines which catches the eye of a high-profile figure.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Whitebeard's Little Brother! Oden's Great Adventure!

programme.title: In the Land of Wano, the Shogun Sukiyaki falls critically ill and names Orochi proxy Shogun until Oden returns in case he dies.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Roger is amazed when he finds out that Oden can read the script on the Ponegliff since he believes it will guide him to the last, undiscovered island where no man has ever been.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Singing out loud, the Roger Pirates continue on with their journey. They soar up to the island above the clouds and go down into the deep sea to get to the island at the sea bottom.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Oden and the Roger Pirates head for the Land of Wano to obtain a copy of the Road Ponegliff. Oden sees Kin'emon and the others for the first time in years, but he immediately returns to the sea leaving his wife and children behind.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Pirates is Born! Arriving at the Last Island!

programme.title: After reaching Laugh Tale, Roger declares the disbanding of his pirate group and disembarks first. Oden gets dropped off at the Land of Wano and reunites with his family and retainers.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Land of Wano! The Roger Pirates Disband!

programme.title: Enraged by Orochi's tyrannical acts, Oden raids his castle in the Flower Capital and points his sword at Orochi. However, hours later, people who were waiting for Oden to come out after defeating Orochi see the unexpected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sad News! The Opening of the Great Pirate Era!

programme.title: Oden keeps dancing naked in the Flower Capital and losing all the trust of the people. One day, Orochi comes to Kuri and reveals his evil plan for the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Raid! Oden and the Akazaya Nine!

programme.title: Kaido comes to the mainland along with his troops to fight against Oden and the Akazaya samurai who were on their way to raid Kaido's mansion. Even though Oden's group are unprepared and outnumbered, they fight hard to save the future of the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Battle! Oden vs. Kaido!

programme.title: Oden and the Akazaya members are sentenced to death by boiling in a pot. Oden asks for a chance to survive which is accepted by Kaido. Then, Oden enters the boiling pot holding his retainers over his head.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Boiled to Death! Oden's One-hour Struggle!

programme.title: As Oden continues trying to survive in the boiling pot holding his retainers over his head, people learn the truth from Shinobu and get shocked. At the same time, Oden tells his retainers the importance of opening the borders of the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Oden Wouldn't Be Oden If It Wasn't Boiled!

programme.title: As Kin'emon and the others run to Oden Castle to save Oden's family, the castle is set on fire and Kaido attacks Toki and her children.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Castle on Fire! The Fate of the Kozuki Clan!

programme.title: The day of the Fire Festival has finally come and the whole army is now getting ready to head for Onigashima to raid Kaido!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Back to the Present Day! 20 Years Later!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and thousands of allies who were supposed to be there are nowhere to be found, but Kin'emon and the others decide to set sail to the stormy sea in a small boat.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Sea Is For Pirates! Raid! To Onigashima!

programme.title: Luffy, Law, and Kid join the Akazaya samurai and begin to fight Kaido's army. The three rivals from the Worst Generation compete with each other as they attack the enemy fleet with their ultimate skills.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst Generation Charges in! The Battle of the Stormy Sea!

programme.title: The Akazaya members are surprised by help from their old mate and Kin'emon notices he made a big mistake which has luckily saved all his allies. As their battle against Kaido's army heats up, the cornered Kanjuro makes a stunning move.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Swept away by Kanjuro, Momonosuke remembers his father, tries to rise above his fear, and speak to his allies. Luffy and the others start heading for Onigashima, but Kaido's army gets in their way again with a formidable weapon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Tearful Promise! The Kidnapped Momonosuke!

programme.title: Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hat crew are excited to see Jimbei again and welcome him as a new member. Meanwhile, Law and the Akazaya members strategize on how to enter Onigashima and attack Kaido.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A New Member! 'First Son of the Sea' Jimbei!

programme.title: To Law and the others' surprise, Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats attack the giant torii gate in front of Onigashima. Meanwhile, Kaido and Orochi are having a big banquet on the island where Kaido's formidable subordinates are also called in.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Kaidos Trump Card! The Tobi Roppo Appear!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and the samurai warriors finally reach Onigashima! Before they set out for the castle as they planned, the samurai warriors use surprising but determined tactics to cut off their retreat which leave the Straw Hats in shock.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Samurai Warriors Earnestness! The Straw Hats Land at Onigashima!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "The Secret Of Mamo"
programme.desc: The world's most wanted master thief, Lupin III is dead! Despite a coroner's report, Interpol Inspector Zenigata is skeptical and discovers that Lupin is actually alive and well and stealing! But who had set up Lupin's death and why?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: The Hida Speedway has been completed and Lupin is looking to take top prize at the first race. The race is actually a trap designed by the Scorpion Gang who are intent on killing Lupin and eliminating all criminal competition.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko has stolen something from a man named Pycal, and he wants it back. Pycal is a magician who is able to shoot flames from his hands, walk on air, and deflect bullets with ease. Lupin goes up against Pycal in hopes of saving Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: The Man They Called a Magician

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A boat collision ruins Lupin and Fujiko's quiet boating expedition. They discover a woman named Linda in the other boat just as gunmen on a larger boat attack them.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko successfully pull off a heist; that is until Zenigata manages to shoot Lupin with a tranquilizer dart. Zenigata hauls Lupin off to jail. Despite Fujiko's best efforts, she cannot break Lupin out of prison.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: With the help of some quick gunplay by his partner Jigen, Lupin takes on the world in elaborate heists, classic car chases, and nasty explosions. Fujiko, a buxom redhead with a penchant for betrayal, always gets tangled up in Lupin's capers.
programme.sub-title: The Coming of Goemon the Thirteenth

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: One rainy afternoon, a man seeks Lupin's help on behalf of a young woman. The woman is actually Fujiko, who is after a diamond known as "The Star of Killamanjaro". The diamond was implanted into the chest of a mob boss.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Three scrolls contain the secret of creating a blade like the Zantetsuken. Lupin wants to steal them as a matter of family pride because his grandfather, Arsene Lupin, stole them back in the 19th century.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Napoleon once owned a deck of fortune-telling cards that are now in the hands of a millionaire known as Mr. Gold. Lupin plans to steal them during Mr. Gold's birthday party, and Zenigata plans to stop him. Lupin succeeds in stealing the mysterious cards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang aim to steal the blueprints for a new computer. In their way is a man skilled with the machinegun and his hit-man partner named Poon, who used to be Fujiko's partner in the past.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is posing as Lupin and blowing up bridges, causing a lot of damage and injuries. Lupin and Jigen discover that the bomber is trying to force an armored car to travel along a route of his choosing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Mamo Kyosuke claims that Lupin will disappear from the world in four days. He claims that he is a time traveler from 2874 seeking revenge. Apparently, Lupin XIII destroyed the Mamo clan on March 2874.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are both after the legendary Eye of the Nile emerald. It is going to be a wedding gift presented at a wedding being held on a yacht.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Zenigata has been invited to an international police convention in Europe; his chief wants him to go, but Zenigata does not want to since Lupin has declared that he will steal a gold bust within the next three days.
programme.sub-title: Let's Catch Lupin and Go to Europe

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko goads Lupin into stealing a large shipment of diamonds. Lupin takes the task despite Jigen's protest that Fujiko is playing them for fools. Of course, Jigen is right.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko invites Lupin and the gang to a famous nightclub owned by the sexy Hoshikage Rinko. Only Goemon refuses. This was a wise move as Rinko places timebombs on Fujiko, Jigen, and Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Smith is an art thief that is selling stolen paintings under the guise of a beauty contest. Lupin decides he wants in on the action as well, promising to steal away the treasured paintings.
programme.sub-title: Keep an Eye On the Beauty Contest

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Inspector Ganimard III is the grandson of Lupin I's archnemesis. He has come to Japan as the head of security for the 1972 France Fair but also intends to restore his family's honor by arresting Lupin III.
programme.sub-title: Which of the Third Generation Will Win!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is committing thefts under Lupin's name. Lupin follows the imposters back to their island hideout. He has apparently stumbled into a whole island of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Rie is being held captive though she does not realize it. She believes the man holding her is a friend of her father, Ken Makita. Lupin shows up to rescue her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Gordon, an FBI computer specialist, is in Japan to operate a computer capable of predicting crimes and determining how to stop them. The Metropolitan Police Department hopes that this will finally help them capture Lupin.
programme.sub-title: The First Move Wins Computer Operation!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A disputed horde of recently discovered ancient gold coins draws the attention of Lupin and company. As the ownership of the coins is disputed, Lupin decides to settle the matter on his own by stealing them from the Dai Nippon Bank.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Bye Bye, Lady Liberty
programme.desc: Foiled repeatedly by the predictions of Interpol's supercomputer, professional looter Lupin III has settled down. A sinister secret organization and a young computer genius are thrown into the mix. And whose side is the buxom Fujiko on this time?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Hemingway Papers
programme.desc: The legendary last manuscript of the great Ernest Hemingway tells of a buried treasure on an island far away and thief extraordinaire Lupin is on the trail! But he gets caught up in a local civil war, Lupin will have to keep his wits or risk his life!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Napoleon's Dictionary
programme.desc: Lupin learns of his grandfather's secret treasure, supposedly hidden in the pages of a dictionary previously owned by Napoleon Bonaparte! Said dictionary just happens to be the prize in a cross-country classic car race.

programme.title: Robocop 2, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Robocop 3, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: The Fifth Element, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, and Gary Oldman star in acclaimed director Luc Besson's outrageous sci-fi adventure, an extravagantly styled tale of good against evil set in an unbelievable twenty-third century world.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: Hondo, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Hondo Lane, a cavalry rider who becomes the protector of Angie Lowe as well as a father figure to her boy, Johnny. Angie, determinedly awaiting the return of her husband, refuses to leave their homestead despite the growing danger.

programme.title: Rio Grande, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Lt. Col. Yorke leads his cavalry troops to the Rio Grande to fight a warring tribe. Yorkes toughest battle lies ahead when his unorthodox plan to outwit the elusive Apaches leads to possible court-martial.

programme.title: Big Jake, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: An aging Texas cattle man who has outlived his time swings into action when outlaws kidnap his grandson and wound his son.

programme.title: The Shootist, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Afflicted with a terminal illness, John Bernard Books, the last of the legendary gunfighters, quietly returns to Carson City for medical attention from his old friend Dr. Hostetler.

programme.title: McLintock!, (1963, Western)
programme.desc: The cattle rancher McLintock (John Wayne) puts his brand on the territory and every woman in it! Louise Warren plays a widow who moves with her two children onto McLintocks ranch to serve as cook, while Maureen OHara plays the estranged wife.

programme.title: John Wayne: Gold Strike River, (1934, Western)
programme.desc: A tough guy and cranky friend strike it rich on a gold claim and become the target of ruthless assayers. In Vibrant Color!

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: Ghost Town, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: A spirited romantic comedy, Ghost Town is the story of Bertram Pincus, a cranky Manhattan dentist who develops the unwelcome ability to see dead people.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Timeline, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: The Poughkeepsie Tapes, (2009, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: When hundreds of videotapes showing torture, murder, and dismemberment are found in an abandoned house, they reveal a serial killer's decade-long reign of terror and become the most disturbing collection of evidence homicide detectives have ever seen.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk, (2003, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: For many years a mysterious monk with no name (Chow Yun-Fat) has zigzagged the globe to protect an ancient scroll -- a scroll that holds the key to unlimited power. Now the Monk must look for a new scrollkeeper.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: Daryl and Carol find an old cabin that takes Daryl back to his years away from the group after Rick disappeared; he relives the painful memory of meeting a reticent survivor and the toxic events that amplified his relationship with Dog.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: With Maggie's map, Gabriel and Aaron search for food and supplies to bring back to Alexandria; checking out one more location, they chance upon a stash; faith is broken and optimism is fragmented when they are put to the ultimate test.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Eugene, Ezekiel, Yumiko, and Princess are captured and separated by the mysterious troopers that surrounded them at the rail yard; claustrophobic with mounting anxiety, Princess struggles with memories of her traumatic past and plans to escape.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: At the lowest point in their friendship, Daryl and Carol come to a fork in the road and head their separate ways; Carol returns to Alexandria, while Daryl stays on the road, each going into their own type of survival mode.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: With Maggie back at Alexandria, Carol takes Negan on a journey to minimize the increasing tension; here, Negan reflects on his late wife, Lucille, and the events that led him to this point.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl leads a mission team to scavenge the military base he discovered; Maggie tells her story, prompting a new mission for survival that only Negan can lead; Eugene and his group go through assessment by the Commonwealth's paramilitary police.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Maggie's mission takes the team through a subway tunnel, challenged by lurking walkers and a recalcitrant Negan; with Eugene's group, Yumiko seeks answers about her brother and demands expedited processing into the Commonwealth.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Maggie's mission team gets separated and hunted by the Reapers; Carol, Rosita, Magna and Kelly attempt to catch horses for Alexandria; Judith, RJ, Hershel and Gracie cope with their parents going away.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl and Dog get captured by the Reapers; they are taken to the Meridian and reconnect with a familiar figure from their past.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Aaron, Carol, Lydia, and Jerry go to the Hilltop ruins for blacksmith tools and nearby game; Eugene's group goes through orientation at the Commonwealth; Maggie and Negan trudge through the woods; Judith and the kids clash with teenagers.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Escaping from walkers, Connie and Virgil hide in a house occupied by mysterious creatures; Pope tests Daryl's loyalty to the Reapers with a conflicting mission; Kelly leaves Alexandria in search of Connie.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Maggie and Elijah learn a new survival tactic from Negan; Eugene's group clears walkers to pay their fines; Yumiko interviews for an upper-class job; Daryl learns more about Leah and the Reapers; Gabriel encounters a man of God.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Reapers defend Meridian from an incoming herd; Pope suspects Maggie is behind the attack, while Daryl treads carefully; Alexandrians scramble to protect themselves when a violent storm leaves them vulnerable to walkers.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl, Maggie, Gabriel, Negan and Elijah battle the Reapers for food; Aaron and the Alexandrians must survive a storm.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The heroes experience Halloween in the Commonwealth; Daryl and Rosita undergo military training led by Mercer; Carol investigates Ezekiel's medical condition.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Eugene looks for Stephanie after she mysteriously goes missing; Connie investigates a story on Trooper Davis; Carol helps Hornsby with a labor dispute at a drug farm.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Aaron and Maggie meet Gov. Pamela Milton as she tours Alexandria, Oceanside and Hilltop; Ezekiel finds himself lucky during a routine checkup; Eugene processes Max's story.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Maggie, Lydia and Elijah help a stranger from another community called Riverbend; they run into Aaron, who tells them about a mission he embarked on with Gabriel as emissaries for the Commonwealth.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Maggie, Lydia and Elijah help Aaron and Gabriel on a rescue mission; in the chaos, Negan finds himself watching over Hershel; Sebastian coerces Daryl and Rosita into pulling a heist.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: As Galaxia closes in to take Sailor Moons star seed, the Light of Hope reveals itself. The Light of Hope begs Usagi to use its power to stop Galaxia.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Love: The Moonlight Illuminates the Galaxy

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi Tsukino is a schoolgirl who meets a talking cat named Luna. Usagi is transformed into Sailor Moon, the guardian who fights for love and justice.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A house of fortune opens up and gains popularity for its predictions. The customers begin to act violent. Usagi and Luna decide to investigate.
programme.sub-title: Punishment Awaits: The House Of Fortune Is The Monster Mansion

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls in town are tuning in to a radio program that reads out love letters. A sleeping sickness is plaguing the town that puts people to sleep.
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious Sleeping Sickness: Protect the Girls In Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is shocked to find out that shes gained weight from too much eating. Determined to get back into shape, Usagi and her friends join a gym.
programme.sub-title: Learn How to Be Skinny from Usagi

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Shingo brings home a pet Chanela. Shingo becomes so absorbed in the Chanela that he stops going to school, which worries Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Scent of a Monster: Chanela Will Steal Your Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi bumps into Yusuke Amade, a famous musician who claims he is being chased by a monster. Usagi and Luna decide to keep an eye on Yusuke.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Melody of Love: Usagi Plays Cupid

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Naru dream of becoming famous like Mikan Shiratori. When the girls hear that Mikan is hosting a talent contest, they see their chance.
programme.sub-title: Usagi Learns Her Lesson: Becoming a Star Is Hard Work

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi befriends Ami Mizuno, the schools smartest girl. But Luna, who senses an unknown energy coming from Ami, suspects her of being a Monster.
programme.sub-title: The Girl Genius Is a Monster: The Brainwashing Cram School of Horror

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Ami find a clock that resembles Luna. That night, the clock emits a strange light that causes Usagi to become very impatient.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Disaster: Beware of the Clock of Confusion

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: People who take the bus near the Hikawa Shrine have started to go missing. Usagi and her friends decide to investigate.
programme.sub-title: The Cursed Bus: Enter Mars, the Guardian of Fire

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians go to the amusement park where visitors have gone missing. But Usagi is more focused on playing than finding the missing people.
programme.sub-title: Usagi vs. Rei: Nightmare in Dream Land

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rei goes off on a luxury cruise with Ami after winning tickets through the local lottery. Feeling left behind, Usagi sneaks aboard the ship.
programme.sub-title: I Want a Boyfriend: The Luxury Cruise Ship is a Trap

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Jadeite is given a warning by Queen Beryl, who can no longer tolerate the generals failures. Jadeite challenges the Sailor Guardians to a showdown.
programme.sub-title: Girls Unite: The End of Jadeite

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rui is a talented tennis player but Naru has noticed a dark change in her. Worried about their classmate, Naru and Usagi go to investigate.
programme.sub-title: A New Enemy Appears: Nephrite's Evil Crest

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami brings Usagi and Rei to her favorite park. Rei decides to have a date with Mamoru at the park before it closes down.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Juban District is having a contest to decide who can design the best wedding dress. Usagi, Rei, and all the girls in town compete.
programme.sub-title: A Girl's Dream: Usagi Becomes a Bride

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A photographer named Kijin Shinokawa holds a modeling contest. All the girls who have entered begin disappearing after Shinokawa photographs them!
programme.sub-title: Usagi's a Model: The Flash of the Monster Camera

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Shingos friend Mika gives him a doll but Shingo unintentionally breaks the doll and hurts Mikas feelings. Shingo decides to apologize.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi receives a love letter from Tuxedo Mask, stating that hed like to meet her. She finds out that all the girls in town received the same letter.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Joy: A Love Letter from Tuxedo Mask

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls search for a vacation spot so they can focus on training. Instead, they settle on a mansion that has a very eerie service staff.
programme.sub-title: The Summer, the Beach, Youth and Ghosts

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami spots Nephrite and follows him to an animation studio that is making the Sailor V movie. Ami calls Usagi and Rei so they can investigate.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Children's Dreams: Friendship Through Anime

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Kingdom of Diamonds is hosting a party to reveal their treasure to the world. Both the Sailor Guardians and the Dark Kingdom crash the party.
programme.sub-title: Romance Under the Moon: Usagi's First Kiss

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Naru has fallen in love with Masato Sanjoin. Knowing that Sanjoin is really Nephrite, Usagi tries to convince Naru to give up on her feelings.

Mas quando um estranho sharknado de areia atinge Las Vegas, Fin jogado de volta ao, lutando contra sharknados em uma corrida cross-country para salvar sua famlia e o mundo - como toda a humanidade j deveria saber, no h como escapar..

programme.title: Conduo Perigosa
programme.desc: Peter Roberts (Thomas Jane), um ex-piloto de corrida automotiva, tornou-se instrutor de motorista e durante uma de suas aulas sequestrado por Simon Keller (John Cusack), que supostamente seria um aluno como qualquer outro. O sequestrador misterioso fora ele a participar de um crime que coloca ambos na mira da polcia e da mfia, desencadeando uma perseguio.

programme.title: Golpe de Risco
programme.desc: Carregado de muita ao, este filme une os maiores ladres do mundo na tentativa de executar o roubo do sculo.

programme.title: Caador de Demnios
programme.desc: Um caador de demnios viaja at uma pequena cidade na esperana de enterrar um antigo, mas indestrutvel demnio. Quando a entidade do mal libertada acidentalmente, ela comea a possuir e matar os moradores da regio, um por um.

programme.title: Iceman: O Viajante do Tempo
programme.desc: Iceman 2: O Viajante do Tempo acompanha os guerreiros da China que foram congelados acidentalmente por 400 anos e acordam na moderna Hong Kong. Ao serem descongelados, retornam no tempo para a batalha que deixaram para trs e conseguirem mudar o destino de sua aldeia.

programme.title: O Vigilante Mascarado
programme.desc: Um pastor e lutador profissional aceita um cargo em uma igreja em dificuldades, onde ele ajuda a comunidade tanto em sua capacidade oficial quanto como seu alter ego.

programme.title: 6 Balas
programme.desc: Quando a filha de um lutador de MMA sequestrada, h somente um homem que pode ajudar a encontr-la um notrio ex-mercenrio, cujo boatos, levou seis tiros no peito.

programme.title: O Novato
programme.desc: Quando o erro de um agente novato custa a vida de toda a sua equipe, ele forado a fugir e deve descobrir a verdade, recriando os eventos da misso malfadada com apenas a gravao de udio para gui-lo.

programme.title: Congelado
programme.desc: Durante um jantar, Robert e sequestrado pela mafia russa e acorda na camara frigorifica de um restaurante. Ele descobre que o confundiram com outro homem, que deve muito dinheiro aos criminosos. La dentro, Robert encontra um policial ferido que pode ser a solucao para o problema.

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: Num futuro em que um experimento fracassado matou quase todas as pessoas, um novo sistema de classes emerge.

programme.title: Megalodon
programme.desc: Uma embarcao militar em busca de um submersvel no identificado se depara com um tubaro gigante, forado a usar apenas o que tem a bordo para se defender da monstruosa fera.

programme.title: O Vigilante Mascarado
programme.desc: Um pastor e lutador profissional aceita um cargo em uma igreja em dificuldades, onde ele ajuda a comunidade tanto em sua capacidade oficial quanto como seu alter ego.

programme.title: Espio Por Acaso
programme.desc: Um menino envolvido em uma aventura de espionagem quando acidentalmente acorda um agente do servio secreto. Juntos, eles tentam resolver um misterioso crime sem soluo h quarenta anos.

programme.title: Trenk, O Cavaleiro Trapalho
programme.desc: Trenk quer tornar-se um cavaleiro e liberar sua famlia. Depois de muitas aventuras, ele resolve o problema do drago e condecorado pelo Duque.

programme.title: Sharky, o Pequeno Pirata
programme.desc: Destemido e cheio de risadas. O Capito Sharky e sua animada tripulao partem para aventuras emocionantes e assustadoras, nas quais aprendem que, mais do que ser o pirata mais temvel, preciso ser um bom amigo

O caula da famlia, Espen Ash Lad e a princesa Kristin embarcam em uma perigosa jornada em busca do lendrio castelo Soria Moria e da fonte da gua da Vida - a nica coisa que pode curar os pais de Kristin e salvar o reino.

programme.title: Uma Amizade Verdadeira

Finn sabe que ele deve resgatar Marshall, mas ele precisa de um veterinrio imediatamente, pois foi abusado por outros ces. O vnculo de amizade imediato.

programme.title: Turma da Luta
programme.desc: Crianas de um bairro pobre enfrentam a invicta equipe Beverly Hills Junior National Karate.

programme.title: Tempo de Mudanas
programme.desc: Enviada para o rancho do seu pai nos EUA durante o vero, uma adolescente e seu cavalo Lucky Lass competem por uma vaga no National Youth Rodeo.

programme.title: Enquanto Houver Esperana
programme.desc: Esta a histria de Anglica, uma garota de 16 anos que est lutando contra um tipo raro de cncer chamado Sndrome Mielodisplsica, sua luta para tentar viver uma vida normal e sua esperana de encontrar seu primeiro amor antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: De Corao Partido
programme.desc: Baseado no romance best-seller de Karen Kingsbury. Quando os pais biolgicos tentam recuperar o filho, um casal deve lutar para manter a custdia do filho adotivo.

programme.title: Em Busca da Carta Proibida
programme.desc: Storm Voeten, filho do impressor Klaas Voeten, torna-se alvo de uma caada da Inquisio. Ajudado por Marieke, uma garota misteriosa que vive nos esgotos subterrneos da Anturpia, Storm est em uma corrida contra o tempo para salvar seu pai da morte.

programme.title: Uma Amizade Verdadeira
programme.desc: Um menino de 13 anos, vira alvo de uns valentes em sua nova escola e se sente sem esperana, at que encontra um co, Marshall, em condies deplorveis. Finn sabe que ele deve resgatar Marshall, mas ele precisa de um veterinrio imediatamente, pois foi abusado por outros ces. O vnculo de amizade imediato.

programme.desc: Lung (Michael Ning) e Chi-Yeung (Louis Cheung) so dois jovens melhores amigos que vivem a vida de maneira irresponsvel e despreocupada. Quando um estranho monstro surge na cidade e comea a transformar as pessoas em zumbis, eles decidem se tornar heris e embarcam em uma jornada para salvar a Terra.

programme.title: Fuga
programme.desc: Dez anos depois que a peste negra devastou seu pais, uma pobre familia viaja em busca de melhores condicoes de vida. Em uma passagem deserta nas montanhas, eles sao atacados por uma gangue de crueis fora-da-lei, que so poupa Signe, uma garota de 19 anos.

programme.title: A Maldio da Floresta
programme.desc: Adam e Clare se mudam para uma rea rural com seu filho recm-nascido. Eles logo comeam a receber avisos sobre espritos malignos na regio, mas a jovem famlia prefere apreciar a beleza da floresta.

programme.title: O Monstro Dentro de Voce
programme.desc: Em uma comunidade desolada, repleta de viciados, aps uma noite louca, Lou acorda com sintomas de uma doena.

programme.title: Em Campo Minado
programme.desc: Em setembro de 2006 no Afeganisto, trs jovens soldados britnicos so enviados para dispersar um bloqueio Talib, mas ao passarem pelo leito de um rio, um dos patrulheiros pisa em uma mina, deixada pela ocupao russa 25 anos atrs. Seus colegas pedem ajuda para resgatar o rapaz, que pode morrer ou ficar gravemente ferido. Mas logo que o reforo chega, eles descobrem que esto cercados por minas e que qualquer movimento em falso pode ser fatal.

programme.desc: Fascinada pelas razes do comportamento violento, a psicloga renomada Dra. Amanda Tyler tem a oportunidade de entrevistar e analisar Jackson Shea, prisioneiro do corredor da morte.

programme.desc: Deus da Guerra se passa no sculo XVI, na dinastia Ming, onde o jovem general Qi Jiguang (Wenzhuo Zhao) conquista uma importante vitria contra os piratas japoneses, comandando o exrcito chins. Quando, quatro anos depois, sua nao mais uma vez atacada, Qi se v obrigado a retornar aos campos de batalha.

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Na poca dos Trs Reinos da China, Cao Cao vive entre tticas militares, amor e relao entre pai e filho.

programme.title: Sem Controle
programme.desc: A vida de um jovem vira de cabea para baixo quando seus sonhos violentos comeam a se confundir com a realidade.

programme.desc: David (Gary Oldman) um capito de colarinho azul que luta para melhorar a vida de sua famlia. Estranhamente atrado por um navio abandonado que est em leilo, David impulsivamente compra o barco, acreditando que ser o bilhete de sua famlia para a felicidade e a prosperidade. Mas logo depois que eles embarcam em sua jornada inaugural, eventos estranhos e assustadores comeam a aterrorizar David e sua famlia, fazendo com que se voltem um contra o outro e duvidem de sua prpria sanidade.

programme.title: Xeque-Mate
programme.desc: Slevin Kelevra (Josh Hartnett) est com vrios problemas em sua vida. O prdio onde mora foi condenado, sua carteira de identidade foi roubada e ele recentemente flagrou sua namorada na cama com outro homem. Para escapar ao menos por algum tempo dos problemas, ele consegue emprestado com seu amigo Nick Fisher (Sam Jaeger) um apartamento em Nova York. Paralelamente um plano est sendo tramado no submundo do crime de Nova York. Para se vingar da morte de seu filho, o Chefe (Morgan Freeman) planeja um golpe no filho de seu arquiinimigo, o Rabino (Ben Kingsley). O Chefe contrata Goodkat (Bruce Willis) para executar o plano, que consiste em encontrar um apostador que deva muito dinheiro ao Chefe a ponto de aceitar matar o filho do Rabino para se livrar da dvida. O escolhido Nick Fisher, o que faz com que Goodkat v at seu apartamento e confunda Slevin com seu alvo.

programme.desc: Um jovem paquistans se v em um conflito entre seu sonho americano, uma crise de refns e sua terra natal.
